feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
